descriptions.X1PAREDU: X1 Parents'/guardians' highest level of education
descriptions.X2PAREDU: X2 Parents'/guardians' highest level of education
descriptions.X1MTHINT: X1 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 math course
descriptions.X2MTHINT_R: X2 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 math course (REVISED)
descriptions.X1SCIINT: X1 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 science course
descriptions.X2SCIINT: X2 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 science course
descriptions.X4X2SES: X4 Revised X2 Socio-economic status composite
descriptions.X3TGPAHIMTH: X3 GPA - highest level mathematics course taken
descriptions.X3TGPAHISCI: X3 GPA - highest level science course taken
descriptions.X5GPAALL: Postsecondary Transcript: GPA at all known institutions attended
descriptions.A1TCHRABSENT: A1 E17D Teacher absenteeism is a problem at this school
descriptions.A1PRNTINV: A1 E17G Lack of parental involvement is a problem at this school
descriptions.A1UNPREP: A1 E17H Students coming unprepared to learn is a problem at this school
descriptions.A1HEALTH: A1 E17I Poor student health is a problem at this school
descriptions.A1RESOURCES: A1 E17J Lack of teacher resources and materials is a problem at this school
descriptions.A1HRTEACHERS: A1 E16A Hours/week spent working with teachers on instructional issues
descriptions.A1HRSTUDENT: A1 E16H Hours/week spent meeting with students
descriptions.A1MTHSCIFAIR: A1 A25A Holds math or science fairs/workshops/competitions
descriptions.A1MSSUMMER: A1 A25B Partners w/ college/university that offers math/science summer program
descriptions.A1MSAFTERSCH: A1 A25C Sponsors a math or science after-school program
descriptions.A1MSMENTOR: A1 A25D Pairs students with mentors in math or science
descriptions.A1MSSPEAKER: A1 A25E Brings in guest speakers to talk about math or science
descriptions.A1MSFLDTRIP: A1 A25F Takes students on math- or science-relevant field trips
descriptions.A1MSPRGMS: A1 A25G Tells students about math/science contests/websites/blogs/other programs
descriptions.C1PLANPARENT: C1 A14 School shares students' career/education plans with their parents
descriptions.C1SIGNOFF: C1 A15 School requires parents to sign off on students' career/education plans

questions.X2PAREDU:
1 = "Less than high school"
2 = "High school diploma or GED or alterntive HS credential"
3 = "Certificate/diploma from school providing occupational training"
4 = "Associate's degree"
5 = "Bachelor's degree"
6 = "Master's degree"
7 = "Ph.D/M.D/Law/other high lvl prof degree"
-8 = "Unit non-response"
